StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: DELETEBUILDING
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.DELETEBUILDING(pBuildingCode IN VARCHAR2) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN&lt;br/&gt; DELETE FROM Building_table building&lt;br/&gt; WHERE building.buildingCode = pBuildingCode;&lt;br/&gt; COMMIT;&lt;br/&gt;END deleteBuilding;
